SEARCH
Package ProcessorCircuitSimulator.Utils

Class SimulatedInstructionsFactory

java.lang.Object
ProcessorCircuitSimulator.Utils.SimulatedInstructionsFactory
public class SimulatedInstructionsFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating simulated instructions based on assembly instructions.

    • SimulatedInstructionsFactory

      public SimulatedInstructionsFactory(RegisterFile registerFile, ProgramCounter programCounter, DataMemory memory, SymbolTable symbolTable)
      Constructs a new SimulatedInstructionsFactory with the specified components.
      Parameters:
      registerFile - the register file of the processor.
      programCounter - the program counter of the processor.
      memory - the data memory of the processor.
      symbolTable - the symbol table of the assembler.

  • Method Details

    • brew

      public Instruction brew(String instruction, int instructionAddress)
      Creates a simulated instruction based on the given assembly instruction and address.
      Parameters:
      instruction - the assembly instruction.
      instructionAddress - the address of the instruction.
      Returns:
      the simulated instruction.

    • prepareParameters

      public int[] prepareParameters(String instruction, int instructionAddress)
      Prepares the parameters for the given assembly instruction and address.
      Parameters:
      instruction - the assembly instruction.
      instructionAddress - the address of the instruction.
      Returns:
      the parameters extracted from the instruction.
